Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: {? | $(this.trait:bead:material) | Painstakingly carved, the pins of this clasp have been intricately detailed into $(this.trait:bead:type) shaped frames, edged in fine, $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) milgrain detailing. A short length of finely wrought $(this.trait:material) chain interconnects the pins at the center, in order to hold it closed.| A pair of $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) pins, edged with fine milgrain detailing that hook to either side of a cloak or cape at the chest. A short length of finely wrought $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) chain interconnects the two pins at the center, in order to hold it closed}{? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | Either pin has been paved with tiny inset $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems along the outer $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) edging in such a way to catch light at any angle.}

{? | $(this.trait:bead:material) | Painstakingly carved, the pins of this clasp have been intricately detailed into $(this.trait:bead:type) shaped frames, edged in fine, $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) milgrain detailing. A short length of finely wrought $(this.trait:material) chain interconnects the pins at the center, in order to hold it closed.| A pair of $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) pins, edged with fine milgrain detailing that hook to either side of a cloak or cape at the chest. A short length of finely wrought $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) chain interconnects the two pins at the center, in order to hold it closed}{? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | Either pin has been paved with tiny inset $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems along the outer $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) edging in such a way to catch light at any angle.}

Encrusted with the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material)s, the outer edging of the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:bead:type) $(this.trait:brief) has been paved with small stones in such a way to catch light at any angle.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] A tasteful fastening used to hold the opening of a cloak or cape together.\{? \| \$(this.trait:bead:material) \| Painstakingly carved, either side of the clasp is primarily crafted from two pieces of \$(this.trait:bead:color) \$(this.trait:bead:material) that have been formed into the shape of detailed \$(this.trait:bead:type) pins. The pins are held together at the center by a short length of finely wrought \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) chain.\| This piece consists of two \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) pins that hook to either side of the garment at the chest. A short length of finely wrought \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) chain interconnects the two pins at the center, in order to hold it closed.\}\{? \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) \| Encrusted with the tiniest of \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material)s, the outer edging of this \$(this.trait:brief) has been paved with small stones in such a way to catch light at any angle.\}
